summary: SummaryGet the perfect pout with the KYLIE COSMETICS Glossy Lip Kit. Delivering mirror-like shine and rich color, this lip kit sculpts, defines, and contours the lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydratingDelivers 12 hours of shineDoesnâ€™t smudge, feather, or fadeGluten-freeFeaturesFormulated with Bouncy-Wrap TechnologyCushiony formulaThe lip liner pencil features a gripping waxy textureThe lip gloss is lightweight and soft on the lipsItem 2642908How To UseFirst, sharpen your Kylie lip liner pencil to a fine point for precise application.Then, outline your lips using short, light strokes, starting from the cupid's bow and working outward.Next, use the applicator to swipe the Kylie lip gloss onto your lips, starting at the center and blending outward.Gently press lips together to ensure the gloss is applied evenly.IngredientsLip Liner: C10-18 Triglycerides, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, [+/- : Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360)].Lip Gloss: Polybutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Isocetyl Stearate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Diisostearyl Malate, Fragrance/Parfum, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil, Vanillin, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Tin Oxide, [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Red 7 (Ci 15850), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: First, sharpen your Kylie lip liner pencil to a fine point for precise application.Then, outline your lips using short, light strokes, starting from the cupid's bow and working outward.Next, use the applicator to swipe the Kylie lip gloss onto your lips, starting at the center and blending outward.Gently press lips together to ensure the gloss is applied evenly.

reviews.headline: I loved this
reviews.comments: Was a little skeptical because glosses tend to be so sticky and tacky but this one surprisingly surpassed my expectations. It applies smooth and glossy. The color is perfect. My only complaint is that I wish it lasted longer.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Going to look for the product in other colors. Love how the gloss looks and stays on lips!

reviews.headline: Dolce K
reviews.comments: I havent purchased her product since 2018 but I saw a review on this exact color and wanted to try it. I love it! It makes my lips look fuller, and the color is amazing !

reviews.headline: Been waiting for it to drop Ulta!!
reviews.comments: I love, LOVEEEE nude shades so when she dropped theseâ€¦ i had to buy them. I live the shade 'comes naturally' bc it matches my natural lip shade so it makes it as a good contour!! Kinda wanna buy ut in the shade kylie too. ðŸ©·

reviews.headline: First time trying a lip kit
reviews.comments: Im not one for lip stick or lip kits, but I'm a huge lip gloss fan. When I saw this product was coming out I was counting the days it comes out. I went to Ulta the day it released not knowing it doesn't come to ulta until a coulle weeks later. I wanted it for a trip but ended up not being able to get it. I just recently got it and I love it! It's very easy to apply (coming from someone who's never used lip liner before) and the gloss has a soft feel making you feel like there's a cloud on your lips (it does feel soft). I recommend this product to everyone and anyone who's trying out lip kits for the first time!! I'm wishing I could get all of them, and I wish you could get it too! I got Dolce K and my bf loves it on me and wants me to get more.
Nonsticky, buildible color, and can be fancy or casual. I love the expresso color because of it's versatility. Best nude lip color ever. Lasts a few hours but easy to reapply

media.headline: The best lip kit ever - obsessed!
media.caption: Shade Kylie

media.headline: soft pencil, it practically writes itself, crazy a
media.caption: Da avere assolutamente nella collezione

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought this lip kit last week, and it's one of the best I've ever used. I usually opt for the Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk lip kit, but this product is amazing. The liners are so easy to use, and the gloss is buttery smoothâ€”it makes my lips look flawless and surprisingly plump, even though I don't have lip fillers. I bought the shade Kylie, and it's the perfect pinky nude. This will forever be my new go-to lip kit.
faceoff_positive.headline: The best lip kit ever - obsessed!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Starting with the lip liner, I thought the quality was good and it applied smoothly, but the shade just wasn't my favorite. It leaned a little orange on me, which didn't pair as well with the pinker gloss. That might just be a personal preference though, because the formula itself worked nicely!

The gloss was definitely the star of the kit for me. The color was so pretty, it had a sweet scent, and it gave a nice amount of coverage. The texture felt comfortable and easy to wear, and overall it delivered a polished look! My only issue was the packaging. The lid kept coming loose in my purse, which made me nervous about spills. If that gets fixed, I think it would make a huge difference because the gloss itself is really enjoyable to use.

Overall, I had fun trying this kit and I can see myself reaching for the gloss again. Even though the liner shade wasn't quite right for me, I love that the kit comes with both products. With a few packaging tweaks, this could be such a great everyday lip duo!
faceoff_negative.headline: Good but packaging needs work
